## okta-admin groups create

Adds a new group with OKTA_GROUP type to your organization.

### Synopsis

Adds a new group with OKTA_GROUP type to your organization.

```
okta-admin groups create <name> [<description>] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for create
```
